headlines.title: Your DNA, Your HEALTH
headlines.detail: MRC-ET Advanced Laboratory a molecular diagnostic research laboratory center in Ethiopia Established in 2012 GC and became operational in 2014 GC.

headlines.title: ዲ ኤን ኤ ወይም ዘረመል
headlines.detail: ኤም አር ሲ-ኢት አድቫንስድ ላብራቶሪ በ ዲኤንኤ ወይም ዘረመል ናሙና ላይ የተመሰረተ ምርመራ በማድረግ ከዉልደት በፊት ወይም በኋላ በዘረመል መዛባት ከትውልድ ወደ ትውልድ ሊወራረሱ የሚችሉ የጤና ችግሮችን ያሳውቃል፣ የተሟላ የላብራቶሪ አገልግሎቶችንም ይሰጣል፡፡

information.title: SARS-CoV2 (COVID-19) testing
information.detail: We offer SARS-CoV2 (COVID-19) testing and complete laboratory services. RT-PCR based COVID-19 test for travelers & patients Results delivered within: 4 hrs. and 12 hrs.

information.title: DOWN SYNDROME
information.detail: DOWN SYNDROME is a condition in which extra genetic material causes delays in the way a child develops, both physically and mentally

information.title: MODY
information.detail: MODY is a rare form of diabetes which is different from both Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes, and runs strongly in families.

information.title: BIRTH DEFECTS
information.detail: BIRTH DEFECTS are problems that some babies have while they are still in the womb. These defects may affect how their organs develop and perform.

information.title: HEREDITARY CANCER
information.detail: CANCER cases occur in someone who inherited a genetic mutation that increases cancer risk.

information.title: Prenatal and Postnatal diagnosis
information.detail: Prenatal genetic diagnosis is meant to detect chromosomal abnormalities before birth.

information.title: Hematologic malignancies
information.detail: These are cancers that affect the blood and lymph. Blood cancer begins in the cells of blood forming tissue or cells of the immune system.

information.title: Tumor characterization
information.detail: These are cancers that affect the blood and lymph. Blood cancer begins in the cells of blood forming tissue or cells of the immune system.
